caption: Relating to the enrollment, including resident status and tuition rates, of certain persons, including persons not authorized to be present in the United States, in public institutions of higher education.
authors: Leo Wilson, Spiller, Paul, Vasut, Patterson
last_action: 02/27/2025 H Referred to Higher Education: Feb 27 2025 11:13AM
summary: The bill modifies Texas education code to prevent unauthorized immigrants from qualifying as state residents for tuition purposes at public higher education institutions. Schools must reclassify previously qualified unauthorized immigrants as non-residents, charge them non-resident tuition rates, and report them to law enforcement. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, this affects any international students without proper authorization.
translation: 该法案修改德克萨斯州教育法规，禁止无合法身份的移民在公立高等教育机构享受州内居民学费待遇。学校必须将先前符合条件的无证移民重新归类为非居民，收取非居民学费，并向执法部门报告。虽然没有特别针对中国移民，但这会影响所有没有适当授权的国际学生。
